Dr. Toast - "False Sunrise" (2011)

posted July 6, 2011 | music, releases



This 4-track EP is the companion to "Gravity is Quiet," and represents those beautiful moments right before sunrise. Or right after. Which was it again?

Download now from drtoast.bandcamp.com in high-quality MP3, AAC, or lossless FLAC formats!

False Profit Records FPR-107 - 4 tracks - 19min 37sec
